subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Trent Hunter scored off a face-off in overtime and the Islanders recovered after blowing a three-goal lead to beat the slumping Thrashers, 5-4, Thursday night in Atlanta.
snippet: Trent Hunter scored off a face-off in overtime and the Islanders recovered after blowing a three-goal lead to beat the slumping Thrashers, 5-4, Thursday night in Atlanta.
